## TranslationService.updateTranslationJob() method

Updates an existing translation job with new data. This operation returns an instance of 'TranslationJob' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static updateTranslationJob({ jobId, translationJob, }: {
        jobId: number;
        translationJob: TranslationJob;
    }): CancelablePromise<TranslationJob>;
```
